title: Casa Grande Ruins National Monument: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management                   Park Statistics               Your Dollars At Work               Laws & Policies            Casa Grande Ruins Foundation Statement: A planning and management document defining the monument's purpose, significance, primary interpretive themes, and fundamental resources and values. (1.96 MB .pdf file)      Casa Grande Ruins Superintendent's Compendium:  The superintendent's orders (compendium) for Casa Grande Ruins National Monument regarding park closures, permit requirements, designations and other restrictions. (640k .pdf file)   Map of Special Use areas in Casa Grande Ruins National Monument (221k pdf file)           Centennial History of Casa Grande Ruins National Monument: A comprehensive history of the first 100 years of the Monument from 1892 to 1992. There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Casa Grande Ruins National Monument.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.
